title: If I own everything in a bundle but 1 skin, will the final item still be reduced?
body:
I own Nidalee and Challenger Nidalee, and I'm looking to buy Challenger Ahri. I don't own Ahri, however. If I buy Ahri with ip, will the Challenger Ahri skin still be reduced in the bundle? I have 850 rp and am wondering if I'll have enough.

Thanks!

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/InEfiWv.png

It'll be enough if you buy Ahri with IP.
I believe these are flexible bundles, meaning that it should decrease based on content that you already have.  It should be reduced!
